post.summary: Get all commissions and reductions by EAN in bulk.
post.description: Gets all commissions and possible reductions by EAN, condition, and optionally price. No more than 100 EANs can be sent in a single request.

parameters.name: request
parameters.description: request

400.description: Bad request: The sent request does not meet the API specification. Please check the error message(s) for more information.

404.description: Not found: The requested item could not been found.

get.summary: Get all commissions and reductions by EAN per single EAN.
get.description: Commissions can be filtered by condition, which defaults to NEW. If price is provided, the exact commission amount will also be calculated.

parameters.name: ean
parameters.description: EAN number associated with this product.

parameters.name: condition
parameters.description: Condition of the offer. It is possible to have more conditions per EAN.

parameters.name: price
parameters.description: The price of the product with a period as a decimal separator.

400.description: Bad request: The sent request does not meet the API specification. Please check the error message(s) for more information.

404.description: Not found: The requested item could not been found.

get.description: A List of inbound shipments.

parameters.name: creation-end

get.description: Retrieve a list of available delivery windows for an inbound shipment.

parameters.name: delivery-date
parameters.description: The expected delivery date for the inbound in ISO 8601 format.

parameters.name: items-to-send
parameters.description: The number of items that will be sent in the inbound.

get.description: The inventory endpoint is a specific LVB/FBB endpoint; it only provides information about your Fulfillment by bol.com Inventory. This endpoint does not provide information about your own stock.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number.

parameters.name: quantity
parameters.description: Filter inventory by quantity.

parameters.name: stock
parameters.description: Filter inventory by stock level.

parameters.name: state
parameters.description: Filter inventory by NCKs-stock level.

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: Filter inventory by EAN or product title.

400.description: Bad request: The sent request does not meet the API specification. Please check the error message(s) for more information.

get.description: Gets a list of invoices from the past 4 weeks. The optional period can be used to retrieve invoices from the past.

parameters.name: period
parameters.description: The period to get invoices for. The period parameter has to comply to the ISO 6801 standard. The format of this standard is as follows: yyyy-mm-dd/yyyy-mm-dd. The period can be no longer than 32 days. The list of invoices is sorted on date in descending order.

parameters.name: orderId
parameters.description: The id of the order to get invoices for. If the response is empty you can safely assume that the OrderId has not generated an InvoiceId yet. In the end, this parameter could be used to check if you have been paid for a certain OrderId.

get.summary: Get an invoice by invoice id
get.description: Gets an invoice by invoice id.

parameters.name: invoiceId
parameters.description: The id of the invoice

get.summary: Get an invoice specification by invoice id
get.description: Gets an invoice specification for an invoice with a paginated list of its transactions.

parameters.name: invoiceId
parameters.description: The id of the invoice

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The page to get

put.description: Offers are uniquely identified by the combination of EAN+Condition. When inserting an EAN+Condition combination that is already known as an offer, this request will result in an update for that offer. When inserting an EAN+Condition combination that is not yet known as an offer, it will result in a newly created offer.

parameters.name: upsertRequest
parameters.description: upsertRequest

400.description: Unable to parse the supplied body

delete.description: Delete multiple offers in a single request up to a maximum of 1000.

parameters.name: deleteBulkRequest
parameters.description: deleteBulkRequest

get.description: Creates a CSV file continaing all offers filtered by published status. If the published status isn't provided, all offers are included. The URI to the created CSV file is returned which can be used in the call to download the CSV file.

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description: Filter the returned offers by published status

400.description: Invalid filter

get.description: The CSV file is created by calling 'Create offers CSV file'

parameters.name: filename
parameters.description: The filename of the CSV file

404.description: Offer file xxx.csv does not exist (anymore)

get.summary: Get an offer by product EAN
get.description: Gets all offers for products with the given EAN. If condition is provided, only offers for the given product EAN with that condition are returned

parameters.name: ean
parameters.description: The EAN of the product to get offers for

parameters.name: condition
parameters.description: The condition of the product to filter offers by

400.description: Invalid parameter

404.description: Offer for EAN XXX not found

parameters.description: The id of the order to get

put.summary: Cancel an order by order item id
put.description: This endpoint can be used to either confirm a cancellation request by the customer, or to cancel an order you yourself are unable to fulfil.

parameters.name: orderItemId
parameters.description: The id of the order item to cancel. The order item id is returned in the order request.

parameters.name: cancellation
parameters.description: cancellation

400.description: Unable to parse the supplied body

get.summary: Get the status of an asynchronous process by id
get.description: Asynchronous endpoints return a process id which is used as a parameter in this endpoint to get the status.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the process-status being requested. This ID is supplied in every response to a PUT/POST request on the other endpoints.

400.description: Invalid parameter

get.summary: Get purchasable shipping labels by product OrderItemId
get.description: Gets all purchasable shipping labels for orders with the given orderItemId.

parameters.description: The orderItemId of the order to get purchasable shipping labels from

400.description: Invalid parameter

404.description: Shipping labels for OrderItemId:{orderItemId} not found

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The page to get

parameters.name: handled
parameters.description: Unhandled or handled returns

parameters.name: fulfilment-method
parameters.description: The fulfilment method to filter orders by

400.description: Value {page} is invalid. must be greater than or equal to 0

put.description: Allows the user to handle a return by setting a new status for it after receiving the returned item(s).

parameters.name: returnNumber
parameters.description: The return number

parameters.name: statusUpdate
parameters.description: The status update requested by the user

400.description: Bad request

get.description: Gets a paginated list of shipments ordered by date for the given fulfilment method and order-id. When no order id is specified, shipments for all orders are returned.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The page number to get

parameters.name: fulfilment-method
parameters.description: The fulfilment method. FBR means Fulfilment By Retailer and FBB means Fulfilment By Bol

parameters.name: order-id
parameters.description: The id of the order to get shipment information for

400.description: Invalid parameter

AddressDetails.title: AddressDetails
AddressDetails.description: The address details of the order

Condition.description: Condition of the offer. It is possible to have more conditions per EAN.

Ean.description: EAN number associated with this product.

Price.description: The price of the product with a period as a decimal separator.

DateTime.description: The date/time in ISO 8601 format when the article was cancelled.

ReasonCode.description: The code representing the reason for cancellation.

Condition.description: Condition of the offer. It is possible to have more conditions per EAN.

Ean.description: EAN number associated with this product.

Percentage.description: Percentage of offer price. This percentage varies per product category.

Price.description: The price of the product with a period as a decimal separator.

TotalCost.description: Total applicable fee calculated based on the offer price provided.

TotalCostWithoutReduction.description: Total applicable fee calculated based on the offer price which would be in effect if you do not meet the maximum price criteria.

TimeSlots.description: An available timeslot to be reserved for inbound shipments.

CreationDate.description: The date the inbound shipment was created in ISO 8601 format.

Id.description: A unique id for an inbound shipment.

LabellingService.description: Indicates whether the inbound will be labeled by bol.com or not.

Reference.description: A user defined reference to identify the inbound shipment with.

State.description: The current state of the inbound shipment.

TimeSlot.description: The chosen timeslot for the inbound shipment.

LabellingService.description: Indicates whether the inbound will be labeled by bol.com or not.

Reference.description: A user defined reference to identify the inbound shipment with.

TimeSlot.description: The chosen timeslot for the inbound shipment.

Bsku.description: BSKU number associated with this product.

Ean.description: EAN number associated with this product.

NckStock.description: The stock that can't be sold (unsaleable)

Stock.description: The stock that can be sold (saleable).

TotalCount.description: The total amount of unique numbers.

TotalPageCount.description: The total amount of available pages with offers.

OrderItem.title: OrderItem
OrderItem.description: Order item details from an order

ErrorMessage.example: The item is already shipped or cancelled

Bsku.description: BSKU number associated with this product.

Ean.description: EAN number associated with this product.

State.description: The current state of the inbound product.

Ean.description: EAN number associated with this product.

Quantity.description: Number of products to generate labels for.

Discount.description: The discount of the item that has been sold.

LabelType.description: The type of the label, representing the way an item is being transported.

PurchasePrice.description: The price the item has been bought for.

RetailerPrice.description: The price the item has been sold for.

ShippingLabelCode.description: An unique code referring to the shipping label.

TransporterCode.description: A code representing the transporter which is being used for transportation.

CostReduction.description: Amount the will be deducted from the commission fee if the maximum price criteria is met.

EndDate.description: Date at which time this commission reduction will end.

MaximumPrice.description: Maximum offer price that can be used to still benefit from a commission reduction.

StartDate.description: Date from which time this commission reduction is applicable.

Condition.description: Condition of the offer. It is possible to have more conditions per EAN, this means one EAN can be linked to multiple offers.  Please choose the EAN+Condition combination you wish to delete.  Note: if you do not specify a Condition, ALL Conditions for this EAN will be deleted

Ean.description: EAN number associated with this offer.

Title.example: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone Illustrated Edition

State.description: The state that was transitioned into.

StateDate.description: The transition date and time in ISO 8601 format.

End.description: The timeslot end date and time in ISO 8601 format.

Start.description: The timeslot start date and time in ISO 8601 format.

UpsertRequest.title: UpsertRequest
UpsertRequest.description: An array of offers to create or update

Condition.description: Whether the offer refers to a new or second hand product.

DeliveryCode.description: The delivery promise that applies to this product.

Description.description: A description that is only applicable when the chosen condition is unequal to NEW. Note: It will be ignored if condition is NEW.  Attention: Maximum amount of characters: 2000.

Ean.description: EAN code for the product being added.

FulfilmentMethod.description: Specifies whether this shipment has been fulfilled by the retailer (FBR) or by bol.com (FBB).

Price.description: The price of the product with a period as a decimal separator. Maximum value: 9999

Publish.description: Boolean (true/false) determining whether the seller desires the product to be offered for sale on the bol.com website. Note: Even when set to true, other factors may cause the offer not to be online.

QuantityInStock.description: The amount of items in stock. Minimum value: 0. Maximum value: 999

ReferenceCode.description: A value that may help you identify this particular offer when receiving orders. This element can optionally be left empty. Attention: Maximum amount of characters: 20.

Title.description: Title of the product as shown on the bol.com webshop. When the EAN is unknown at bol.com, your input will be shown.  However, the bol.com title will be shown when it entails a known EAN.  Attention: Maximum amount of characters: 500.
